entry.title: NULL Pointer Dereference | Deark
entry.summary: Software: https://github.com/jsummers/deark/ Version: 1.5.7-1 Vulnerability: NULL Pointer Dereference CVE: CVE-2021-28855 Description of the product: A utility for file format and metadata analysis, data extraction, decompression, and image format decoding. Summary: An issue was discovered in Deark v1.5.7-1. A specially crafted input file can cause a NULL pointer dereference in dbuf_...

entry.title: Division By Zero | Deark
entry.summary: Version: 1.5.7-1 Bug: Division by Zero CVE: CVE-2021-28856 Description of the product: A utility for file format and metadata analysis, data extraction, decompression, and image format decoding. Summary: An issue was discovered in Deark v1.5.7-1. A specially crafted input file can cause a division by zero in (src/fmtutil.c: 1621) because of the value of bi→pixelsize. Fix: https://g...
